1.「おぅ！ いたいた ラスタ！| そろそろ 帰ってこいよ……: Oh! There you are, Rasta! You should be home|by now...

12.「おい ラスタ……。こりゃあ| いったいぜんたい どうなってやがる？| お前……: Hey, Rasta... what the hell is going on here?|You... now you're dancing...

16.「グワッハハハ！ いやぁ おどれぇたぜ！| まっさか この目で 伝説の除霊踊りを: Gwahahahaha! Well, you got me! I never thought|I'd see the legendary exorcism dance with my|own eyes!

17.「最近のお前は なんてぇか| ひと皮むけた感じが してたけどよ。| こりゃあ ひ: Lately you've been looking like you've peeled|off a skin or something. This is more than|just a peel!

19.「どうりで 合方をほしがるわけだぜ。| 除霊踊りなら ふたりって相場が決まってら: No wonder they want a partner. It's a given|that they'll want two for the exorcism dance.|It's that dance of old legends...

20.「にしても いったい どこで覚えたんだ？| それに さっきの怨霊……なのか？|: But where on earth did you learn that? And|that grudge...? I think it was something about|Kokuen-oh...

21.「さ……さあ。そんなこと言ってたかしら。| あの踊りは 昔 おばあさまに 教わっ: C...come on. Did I say that? My grandmother|taught me that dance a long time ago. I didn't|think it really worked. Such...

24.「なんでもないわ……。| さっきの戦いで すこし ひねっただけよ。: It's nothing... just a slight twist from the|fight earlier.

25.「あちゃあ……。やっちまったな！| こりゃ 次の舞台は ドタキャン伝説だな。: Oh, no... I'm screwed! The next performance|will be a legend of cancellation.

26.「バカ言わないで！ これくらいのケガで| 舞台を降りてたら プロ失格よ。| お客: Don't be silly! It's unprofessional to leave|the stage with an injury like this. The|audience is looking forward to seeing you...

27.「……ダメだ。これくらいだろうと なんだろうと| ケガはケガだ。プロデューサーと: It's no good. An injury is an injury no matter|how bad it is. As a producer, I can't just|overlook it.

29.「デーモンも モーモンもねぇ！| まぁ なんとかしてやりてぇが……ひねった| く: No Demon, no Teeny Sanguini! Well, I'd like to|do something about it, but it takes longer to|heal from a sprain than you'd think.

30.「伝説的スピードで 治す方法でもあれば| いいんだがよ……。: If only there was some way to fix it with|legendary speed...

31.「まてよ……。そういえば伝説に……。| グワッハハハ！ そうか。その手があったか: Wait... come to think of it... legend has|it... guwahahahaha! I see. I didn't know you|had it in you.

32.「おい <pc>。| わりぃが この後 テントまで来てくれ。| 俺ぁ ラスタかつ: Hey <pc>. Excuse me, but you're gonna|have to come by the tent after this. I'll just|grab my rasta and go ahead.

33.「ちいーっと 頼まれてほしいことがあるんで| 手を貸しちゃくれねぇか？| 伝説的: Hey, can you help me with something I need you|to do? I've got a legendary idea.<yesno><close>

34.「グワッハハハ！ こんな状況下でも| 空気読まずに 冗談かますたぁな。| やっぱ:
Gwahahahaha! Even under such circumstances,|you can make a joke without reading the air. I|guess the best of the best have a different|
|taste.

35.「まぁ……冗談は さておきだ。| チカラを貸してくれよ。なっ！| このとーり！<: Well... let's put the jokes aside. Let's see|what you can do. Hey! That's right!<yesno><close>

36.「グワッハハハ！ 恩に着るぜ。| さっすが 俺の見込んだ 踊り子よ。| それじゃ: Gwahahahaha! I'm in your debt. You're the|dancer I always knew you'd be. I'll be waiting|for you in the tent!

37.「おぅおぅ ラスタ。| 景気わりぃ 顔してやがんな。: Oh, oh, Rasta. You're looking a little down in|the dumps, aren't you?

38.「景気ね……。次のステージで 私が踊らなければ| それこそ 悪くなる一方だと 思: The economy... if I don't dance on the next|stage, it's only going to get worse, don't you|think? I've had enough of Bread Ears.

39.「あのなぁ……ラスタ。無理して踊って| もしものことが あってみろ……。| 永遠: You know...Rasta. If you dance too hard and|something happens to you... you'll be the|legend of Bread's ear forever, you know?

40.「わかってるけど……ダメなのよ！| これくらい…… これくらいで| 踊れないよう: I know, but... it's no good! If you can't|dance like this... like this... then I'm...!

41.「まぁ……| わかってらぁ。お前のことだ。| このまま あきらめるワケもねぇよな: Well... you know what I mean. I'm talking|about you. There's no way you're going to give|up now, is there?

45.「グワッハハハハ！ 急に 葉っぱ渡されても| なんのこっちゃ わかんねぇよな。|:
Gwahahahahaha! I don't know what it's all|about if someone suddenly hands me a leaf.|Don't be surprised to hear that. This is the|
|legendary...

46.「カイユの葉じゃない！ | どうして これを……？: That's not a Kaiyu Leaf! How did you get|this...?

48.ラスターシャは カイユの葉を|足首に はりつけた。: Rastasha glued a Kaiyu Leaf to her ankle.

49.「痛みを 優しく包み込むような| この あたたかさ……ホンモノね。: This warmth that gently embraces the|pain...it's real.

50.「まさか あなた……。| 私のために わざわざ| あんな 危険なところに……？: Don't tell me you... went all the way out|there to put yourself in harm's way for me?

51.「まったく……。| ナッチョスといい あなたといい……| お人好しも いいとこだ: I must say... like Nachos and you... you're a|real softy.

52.「よかった……これなら舞台に立てる。| お客さんを がっかりさせずに済むわ……！: Thank God...I can go on stage now. I won't|disappoint the audience...!

53.「か……勘違いしないでよね。| 今回の件と あなたの実力を| 認めるかどうかは: Oh...don't get me wrong. Whether or not I|recognize your competence in this matter is|another story!

54.「あなたなんて まだまだ 半人前なんだから。| あまり 調子に乗らないでよ？: You're still only half a man. Don't get too|carried away, okay?

55.「お…おい ラスタ！？| その態度は いくらなんでも……。: Hey, Rasta! That's no way to behave...

56.「まぁでも……お礼は言っておくわ。| 今は なんだか……無性に踊りたい気分なの。: Well, but... thank you. Right now I'm in the|mood to dance. Thank you.

57.「じゃあ ステージ行ってくるわ。: Okay, I'm off to the stage.

59.「いやあ よかった よかった！| ケガも よくなって 食いぶち確保！| パン耳生: Oh, thank God, thank God! My injury is better,|and I have food! I'm out of the life of Bread.

60.「ラスタと <pc>も| ほんのちっとは 打ち解けたみてぇだしよ。| めでたし: Rasta and <pc> seem to have gotten|along just a little bit better. I'm so happy|for you.

61.「しかし……まだ お前のこと| 半人前とか 言ってたな。| まさか これでも 足: But...he still called you half a man. I didn't|think even this wasn't enough...

62.「まぁ 本人が ああ言ってんなら 仕方ねぇ。| 今回は トホホのホイミンだが お: Well, if she says so, I can't blame her. I'm|sorry to hear that you're a dancer of the|first rank...

63.「しんぼう強く ラスタに示し続けりゃあ| さすがに 納得しねぇワケには いかねぇ:
If we continue to show Rasta how strong we|are, we can't afford not to agree with him.|Next time, let's be recognized as the best|
|mating partner!

65.「こいつは 今回の件の礼だ。気に入るかは| わからねぇが とりあえず 受け取って: This is a thank-you for what you did this|time. I don't know if you'll like it, but take|it anyway.

66.「ああ あいつか？ 死んじゃいねえみたいだな。| 心配いらねぇよ。ちょっくら 仲: Oh, that guy? Looks like he's not dead. Don't|worry about it. I'll call my companion to take|care of him. But that's not the point.

67.ナッチョスは 倒れたオーガを運ぶ|仲間を見届けると ラスターシャを|かついで 獅: Nachos' watched his companion carry the fallen|ogre, then returned to the Lion Gate tent,|carrying Rastasha.
